ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes

HIV.D.DE219Screen for hepatitis CPreventing and treating coinfections - Screen for hepatitis C
HIV.D.DE220Prevent malariaPreventing and treating coinfections - Prevent malaria
HIV.D.DE221Screen for STIsPreventing and treating coinfections - Screen for STIs
HIV.D.DE222Prevent and screen for cervical cancerPreventing and treating coinfections - Prevent and screen for cervical cancer
HIV.D.DE223Anal cancer screening (for men who have sex with men)Preventing and treating coinfections - Anal cancer screening (for men who have sex with men)
HIV.D.DE224Assessment and provision of vaccinationsPreventing and treating coinfections - Assessment and provision of vaccinations

description.value: Codes representing possible values for the Preventing and treating coinfections element
